events.title: AI for Africa - IndabaX Benin 2025
events.description: A premier gathering focused on advancing AI research and collaboration across Africa.
events.highlight: Hands-on AI labs, community collaboration, and research showcases.

events.title: AI Youth Camp - Benin
events.description: Empowering young minds with hands-on AI tools and mentorship sessions.
events.highlight: Coding challenges, team projects, and startup pitch day.

events.title: FutureTech Africa 2025
events.description: Exploring the future of technology across the African continent.
events.highlight: Tech showcases, panel discussions, and futuristic demos.

organisers.name: Emmanuel D. Houngbo
organisers.bio: Tech ecosystem builder leading community-driven AI events in West Africa.

organisers.name: Aminatou Bello
organisers.bio: Strategic thinker connecting local and global partners to support youth in tech.

organisers.name: Jules K. Agossa
organisers.bio: Experienced operations manager ensuring events run smoothly from start to finish.

organisers.name: Sandrine Hounsa
organisers.bio: Digital storyteller amplifying African innovation stories through media.

pastEvents.title: IndabaX Benin 2024
pastEvents.highlight: Over 300 attendees, 12 speakers, and a full day of hands-on ML sessions.
pastEvents.description: A historic event focusing on practical AI and ML education in Benin.

pastEvents.title: Local Maker Fair
pastEvents.highlight: Celebrated local inventors, from smart textiles to drone prototypes.
pastEvents.description: An expo for community-based innovation and open-source tech.

testimonials.name: Claudine A.
testimonials.feedback: The IndabaX event changed my life. I'm now working on my first ML project!

testimonials.name: Issifou T.
testimonials.feedback: It was inspiring to meet others passionate about tech and Beninese culture.

testimonials.name: Awa D.
testimonials.feedback: AI Youth Camp helped me discover my interest in data science!

testimonials.name: Koffi M.
testimonials.feedback: FutureTech Africa gave me great ideas for my startup!

speakers.name: Moustapha Cissé
speakers.bio: Former head of Google AI in Accra, championing ethical AI development in Africa.

speakers.name: Shakir Mohamed
speakers.bio: Research Director at DeepMind with deep interest in fairness and inclusion in AI.

speakers.name: Sara Hooker
speakers.bio: Leading accessible AI education and equitable research initiatives across Africa.

speakers.name: Dr. Aline Dossou
speakers.bio: Beninese AI scientist working to democratize AI research in francophone Africa.

speakers.name: Kossi Mensah
speakers.bio: Software engineer building scalable ML solutions for real-time logistics.

speakers.name: Fatima Sow
speakers.bio: Data scientist empowering local farmers with AI-powered crop prediction tools.

speakers.name: Jean Claude
speakers.bio: Ethics researcher working on building frameworks for inclusive AI in Africa.

leaders.bio: Tech ecosystem builder leading community-driven AI events in West Africa.
